27FCB7D0.Line7.6D03F: He must be planning to summon Andariel somewhere else, but he did his research here.

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: Look at all this. An archive of the forbidden, hand-picked by Elias himself.

C1F13152.Line9.6D03F: Look around. There might be some clues that can tell us where the ritual will take place.

FD11A47B.VoiceDir5.6D03F: Hint of excitement and dread. They have finally reached Elias's chambers.
